thread.title: BRIEF-Frontier Communications Prices $1.6 Bln Second Lien Secured Notes Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Frontier Communications Prices $1.6 Bln Second Lien Secured Notes Offering
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Frontier Communications Corp:
* FRONTIER COMMUNICATIONS PRICES $1.6 BILLION SECOND LIEN SECURED NOTES OFFERING
* FRONTIER COMMUNICATIONS CORP - ‍NOTES WILL BEAR INTEREST AT 8.500% PER YEAR​
* FRONTIER COMMUNICATIONS CORP - ‍PRICED PRIVATE OFFERING OF $1.6 BILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SECOND LIEN SECURED NOTES DUE 2026​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
